description: It comes amid allegations that the company is failing to protect its staff from the coronavirus.
title: Coronavirus: Amazon ordered to deliver only essential items in France
title_page: Coronavirus: Amazon ordered to deliver only essential items in France - BBC News
maintext: Julien Vincent, a union representative, also told Reuters that he estimated around 30% to 40% of the company¡¯s employees in France had stopped going into work - either out of fear of catching the coronavirus or because they were unable to arrange or afford childcare after schools were closed.
